name: The Treasure Hunt
description:
I created this game for the brackeys 2022.1 jam.

The game:

You control a pirate captain who has obtained a very special map. The map points to hidden treasure. Open the map to find the treasure, sail to it and make sure that others do not get the treasure before you do.

KEYBINDS:
  •  WASD or arrow keys: movement
  • E: Toggle walking and sailing
  • M: Toggle map;
  • SPACE: Fire cannons
Assets:

All art is created by Kenney. 
SFX created with BFXR.
Music is from  BenSound. (Instinct,  Deep Blue )
